title: Wall Street Breakfast, May 17th: Government Borrowing Grows; China Approves Toshiba Sale
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Our top stories today: Government borrowing continues to escalate; the EU may move to protect companies doing business with Iran; and China approves Toshiba’s chip unit sale to a group led by Bain Capital. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
